message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe has immense value. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, I would like to extend an initial offer of $2000000 for it. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value and my budget. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
